first_tick_commands: execute as @s[tag=mark.50.superior] run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.superior.color 1
execute as @s[tag=mark.50.superior] run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.flame 10
execute as @s[tag=mark.50.superior] run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.superior.color 1
execute as @s[tag=mark.50.superior] run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.flame 10
last_tick_commands: execute as @s[tag=mark.50.superior] run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.superior.color 0
execute as @s[tag=mark.50.superior] run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.flame 8

first_tick_commands: execute as @s unless score @s satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.beams matches 0.. run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.beams 0
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.beams=0..1}] run scoreboard players add @s satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.beams 1
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.beams=1..3}] run scoreboard players remove @s satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.beams 1
execute as @s anchored eyes run particle minecraft:sweep_attack ^ ^ ^1 0.1 0.1 0.1 0 1 normal
execute as @s anchored eyes run particle minecraft:sweep_attack ^ ^ ^1 0.1 0.1 0.1 0 1 normal
execute as @s anchored eyes run particle minecraft:sweep_attack ^ ^ ^1 0.1 0.1 0.1 0 1 normal
execute as @s[tag=mark.50.superior] run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.superior.color 1
execute as @s[tag=mark.50.superior] run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.flame 10

commands: execute at @s as @e run effect give @e[tag=!superior.shockwave,distance=..5] minecraft:slowness 1 255 true
